description: Clumsy Arashiyama is a girl with a love for mysteries and a knack for getting into trouble. She works for an old lady`s lackluster maid caf√© in a small shopping district. The cafe is largely unsuccessful in attracting customers aside from Sanada, a regular and one of Arashiyama`s classmates (who has a secret crush on her).
name: Arashiyama Hotori
